rule.name: Sonar.UnknownIssueType
rule.description:
This rule is used to capture IssueTypes reported by ReSharper which are previously unknown to the plugin. Instructions will be provided with the violations on how to properly include the IssueTypes for future analysis runs.
(Category: Sonar Plugin Missing Data)

rule.name: ClassNeverInstantiated.Global
rule.description:
Class is never instantiated: Non-private accessibility
(Category: Potential Code Quality Issues)

rule.name: ClassWithVirtualMembersNeverInherited.Global
rule.description:
Class with virtual(overridable) members never inherited: Non-private accessibility
(Category: Redundancies in Symbol Declarations)

rule.name: ConvertToConstant.Global
rule.description:
Convert local variable or field to constant: Non-private accessibility
(Category: Common Practices and Code Improvements)

rule.name: EventNeverSubscribedTo.Global
rule.description:
Event is never subscribed to: Non-private accessibility
(Category: Potential Code Quality Issues)

rule.name: FieldCanBeMadeReadOnly.Global
rule.description:
Field can be made readonly: Non-private accessibility
(Category: Common Practices and Code Improvements)

rule.name: IntroduceOptionalParameters.Global
rule.description:
Introduce optional parameters: Non-private accessibility

rule.name: MemberCanBeMadeStatic.Global
rule.description:
Member can be made static(shared): Non-private accessibility

rule.name: MemberCanBePrivate.Global
rule.description:
Member can be made private: Non-private accessibility
(Category: Common Practices and Code Improvements)

rule.name: MemberCanBeProtected.Global
rule.description:
Member can be made protected: Non-private accessibility
(Category: Common Practices and Code Improvements)

rule.name: NotAccessedField.Global
rule.description:
Non-accessed field: Non-private accessibility
(Category: Potential Code Quality Issues)

rule.name: ParameterTypeCanBeEnumerable.Global
rule.description:
Parameter type can be IEnumerable: Non-private accessibility

Redundant field initializer

(Category: Redundancies in Symbol Declarations)

rule.name: RedundantThisQualifier
rule.description:
Redundant 'this.' qualifier
(Category: Redundancies in Code)

rule.name: ReturnTypeCanBeEnumerable.Global
rule.description:
Return type can be IEnumerable: Non-private accessibility
(Category: Common Practices and Code Improvements)

rule.name: SuggestUseVarKeywordEvident
rule.description:
Use 'var' keyword when initializer explicitly declares type
ReSharper Wiki page

rule.name: UnassignedField.Compiler
rule.description:
Unassigned field
(Category: Compiler Warnings)

rule.name: UnassignedField.Global
rule.description:
Unassigned field: Non-private accessibility
(Category: Potential Code Quality Issues)

rule.name: UnusedAutoPropertyAccessor.Global
rule.description:
Auto-implemented property accessor is never used: Non-private accessibility

rule.name: UnusedField.Compiler
rule.description:
Field is never used
(Category: Compiler Warnings)

rule.name: UnusedMember.Global
rule.description:
Type or type member is never used: Non-private accessibility
(Category: Redundancies in Symbol Declarations)

rule.name: UnusedMemberHiearchy.Global
rule.description:
Type member is only used in overrides: Non-private accessibility
(Category: Redundancies in Symbol Declarations)

rule.name: UnusedMemberInSuper.Global
rule.description:
Type member is never accessed via base type: Non-private accessibility
(Category: Redundancies in Symbol Declarations)

rule.name: UnusedMethodReturnValue.Global
rule.description:
Method return value is never used: Non-private accessibility
(Category: Redundancies in Symbol Declarations)

rule.name: UnusedParameter.Global
rule.description:
Unused parameter: Non-private accessibility
(Category: Redundancies in Symbol Declarations)

rule.name: VirtualMemberNeverOverriden.Global
rule.description:
Virtual(overridable) member is never overridden: Non-private accessibility
(Category: Redundancies in Symbol Declarations)

rule.description:
Access to disposed closure

rule.description:
Access to a static member of a type via a derived type

rule.name: AssignNullToNotNullAttribute
rule.description:
Possible 'null' assignment to entity marked with 'Value cannot be null' attribute

(Category: Constraints Violations)

rule.name: BaseMethodCallWithDefaultParameter
rule.description:
Call to base member with implicit default parameters
(Category: Potential Code Quality Issues)

rule.name: BaseObjectEqualsIsObjectEquals
rule.description:
Call to 'base.Equals(...)' is reference equality
(Category: Potential Code Quality Issues)

rule.name: BaseObjectGetHashCodeCallInGetHashCode
rule.description:
Overriden GetHashCode calls base 'Object.GetHashCode()'
(Category: Potential Code Quality Issues)

rule.name: BitwiseOperatorOnEnumWithoutFlags
rule.description:
Bitwise operation on enum which is not marked by [Flags] attribute
(Category: Potential Code Quality Issues)

rule.name: CSharpErrors
rule.description: (Category: C# Compiler Errors)

rule.name: CSharpWarnings::CS0108
rule.description:
CS0108,CS0114:Keyword 'new' is required
(Category: Compiler Warnings)

rule.name: CSharpWarnings::CS0109
rule.description:
CS0109:Keyword 'new' is redundant
(Category: Compiler Warnings)

rule.name: CSharpWarnings::CS0162
rule.description:
CS0162:Code is unreachable
(Category: Compiler Warnings)

rule.name: CSharpWarnings::CS0183
rule.description:
CS0183:Given expression is always of the provided type
(Category: Compiler Warnings)

rule.name: CSharpWarnings::CS0465
rule.description:
CS0465:Introducing a 'Finalize' method can interfere with destructor invocation
(Category: Compiler Warnings)

rule.name: CSharpWarnings::CS0612
rule.description:
CS0612:Use of obsolete symbol (without message)
(Category: Compiler Warnings)

rule.name: CSharpWarnings::CS0618
rule.description:
CS0618:Use of obsolete symbol
(Category: Compiler Warnings)

rule.name: CSharpWarnings::CS0659
rule.description:
CS0659:Class overrides Object.Equals(object o) but not Object.GetHashCode()

rule.name: CSharpWarnings::CS1030
rule.description:
CS1030:'#warning' directive
(Category: Compiler Warnings)

rule.name: CSharpWarnings::CS1570
rule.description:
CS1570:Invalid XML in XML comment
(Category: Compiler Warnings)

rule.name: CSharpWarnings::CS1571
rule.description:
CS1571:Duplicate param tag in XML comment
(Category: Compiler Warnings)

rule.name: CSharpWarnings::CS1573
rule.description:
CS1573:Parameter has no matching param tag in the XML comment
(Category: Compiler Warnings)

rule.name: CSharpWarnings::CS1574
rule.description:
CS1574:Ambiguous reference in XML comment

rule.name: CSharpWarnings::CS1584
rule.description:
CS1584:Syntax error in XML comment
(Category: Compiler Warnings)

rule.name: CSharpWarnings::CS1587
rule.description:
CS1587:XML comment is not placed on a valid language element
(Category: Compiler Warnings)

rule.name: CSharpWarnings::CS1591
rule.description:
CS1591:Missing XML comment for publicly visible type or member
(Category: Compiler Warnings)

rule.description:

rule.name: SpecifyStringComparison
rule.description:
Specify string comparison explicitly
(Category: Common Practices and Code Improvements)

rule.name: StaticFieldInGenericType
rule.description:
Static field in generic type
(Category: Potential Code Quality Issues)

rule.name: StringCompareIsCultureSpecific.1
rule.description:
String.Compare is culture-specific: String.Compare(string, string) is culture-specific
(Category: Common Practices and Code Improvements)

rule.name: StringCompareIsCultureSpecific.3
rule.description:
String.Compare is culture-specific: String.Compare(string, string, bool) is culture-specific
(Category: Common Practices and Code Improvements)

rule.name: StringCompareToIsCultureSpecific
rule.description:
String.CompareTo is culture-specific: String.CompareTo is culture-specific
(Category: Common Practices and Code Improvements)

rule.name: StringIndexOfIsCultureSpecific.1
rule.description:
String.IndexOf is culture-specific: String.IndexOf(string) is culture-specific
(Category: Common Practices and Code Improvements)

rule.name: StringIndexOfIsCultureSpecific.2
rule.description:
String.IndexOf is culture-specific: String.IndexOf(string, int) is culture-specific
(Category: Common Practices and Code Improvements)

rule.name: StringLastIndexOfIsCultureSpecific.1
rule.description:
String.LastIndexOf is culture-specific: String.LastIndexOf(string) is culture-specific
(Category: Common Practices and Code Improvements)

rule.name: StringLastIndexOfIsCultureSpecific.2
rule.description:
String.LastIndexOf is culture-specific: String.LastIndexOf(string, int) is culture-specific
(Category: Common Practices and Code Improvements)

rule.name: SuggestBaseTypeForParameter
rule.description:
Parameter can be declared with base type
(Category: Common Practices and Code Improvements)

rule.name: SuggestUseVarKeywordEverywhere
rule.description:
Use 'var' keyword when possible
(Category: Language Usage Opportunities)

rule.name: SuspiciousTypeConversion.Global
rule.description:
Suspicious type conversion or check
(Category: Potential Code Quality Issues)

rule.name: TailRecursiveCall
rule.description:
Tail recursive call may be replaced with loop
(Category: Potential Code Quality Issues)

rule.name: ThreadStaticFieldHasInitializer
rule.description:
Thread static field has initializer

(Category: Potential Code Quality Issues)

rule.name: TooWideLocalVariableScope
rule.description:
Local variable has too wide declaration scope
(Category: Common Practices and Code Improvements)

rule.name: TypeParameterCanBeVariant
rule.description:
Type parameter could be declared as covariant or contravariant
(Category: Common Practices and Code Improvements)

rule.name: UnassignedReadonlyField
rule.description:
Unassigned readonly field
(Category: Potential Code Quality Issues)

rule.name: UnassignedReadonlyField.Compiler
rule.description:
Unassigned readonly field
(Category: Compiler Warnings)

rule.name: UnreachableCode
rule.description:
Unreachable code detected
(Category: Common Practices and Code Improvements)

rule.name: UnusedAnonymousMethodSignature
rule.description:
Anonymous method signature is not necessary
(Category: Redundancies in Code)

rule.name: UnusedAutoPropertyAccessor.Local
rule.description:
Auto-implemented property accessor is never used: Private accessibility
(Category: Potential Code Quality Issues)

rule.name: UnusedMember.Local
rule.description:
Type or type member is never used: Private accessibility
(Category: Redundancies in Symbol Declarations)

rule.name: UnusedMethodReturnValue.Local
rule.description:
Method return value is never used: Private accessibility
(Category: Redundancies in Symbol Declarations)

rule.name: UnusedParameter.Local
rule.description:
Unused parameter: Private accessibility
(Category: Redundancies in Symbol Declarations)

rule.name: UnusedTypeParameter
rule.description:
Unused type parameter
(Category: Redundancies in Symbol Declarations)

rule.name: UnusedVariable
rule.description:
Unused local variable
(Category: Redundancies in Symbol Declarations)

rule.name: UnusedVariable.Compiler
rule.description:
Unused local variable
(Category: Compiler Warnings)

rule.name: UseFourSlashesComment
rule.description:
Use ////-comment
(Category: Potential Code Quality Issues)

rule.name: UseMethodAny.0
rule.description:
Use method Any(): Use method Any()

rule.name: UseMethodAny.1
rule.description:

rule.name: UseMethodAny.2
rule.description:
Use method Any(): Use method Any()
(Category: Common Practices and Code Improvements)

rule.name: UseMethodIsInstanceOfType
rule.description:
Use method IsInstanceOfType(..): Use method IsInstanceOfType(..)
(Category: Common Practices and Code Improvements)

rule.name: UseObjectOrCollectionInitializer
rule.description:
Use object or collection initializer when possible
(Category: Language Usage Opportunities)

rule.name: ValueParameterNotUsed
rule.description:
'value' parameter is not used

(Category: Potential Code Quality Issues)

rule.name: Xaml.BindingWithContextNotResolved
rule.description:
Unresolved binding path when DataContext is known

rule.name: Xaml.BindingWithoutContextNotResolved
rule.description:
Unresolved binding path when DataContext is unknown
